"""Define the model."""
kdict = [{'type': 'gaussian', 'width': 1.0, 'scaling': 1.0, 'dimension':
    'single'}]
gp = GaussianProcess(train_fp=train_features, train_target=train_targets,
    kernel_list=kdict, regularization=np.sqrt(0.01),
    optimize_hyperparameters=True, scale_data=True)
return gp
